resources.string: הצג תמונות ממוזערות של אנשי קשר
החל מ- Android 10 , לאפליקציה אין גישה לקבצים שלך
כל האפליקציות שלנו הן ללא פרסומות, קוד פתוח וזה תמיד יישאר כך. בעזרתך אנו מסוגלים ליישם תכונות נוספות ולהפוך אותן לטובות עוד יותר
Please update Goodwy Thank You to the latest version

Yes, of course. You can spread the word about the apps or give good feedback and ratings. You can also help by translating the apps in a new language, or just update some existing translations. You can find the guide at https://github.com/Goodwy/Discussion , or just shoot me a message at goodwy.dev@gmail.com if you need help.

As your app version is no longer updated, the bugs you have maybe spotted will never be fixed. There will also be no new functions added. You can purchase the Pro version on Google Play for a small sum of money. It is a one time payment, which means that once you purchase it, you will never have to pay again. Not even after getting a new device. If you won\'t like the Pro version, you can just uninstall it within a few hours and you will automatically get your money back. If you want a refund anytime later, just contact us at goodwy.dev@gmail.com and you will get it.

This list contains everyone that noticeably helped any app within the Goodwy suite, not only this one. Translations are handled by volunteers, let us know if you want to help too. The guide to translating is at this website, or just contact us at goodwy.dev@gmail.com if you have any questions. Thanks to all contributors and other supporters!
DEPRECATED: This version of the app is no longer maintained, get the Pro version at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.goodwy.xxx.pro

Don\'t forget that if you uninstall any paid app within 2 hours, you will automatically be refunded. If you want a refund anytime later, just contact us at goodwy.dev@gmail.com and you will get it. That makes it easy to try it out :)

Hey,

if you like this application, then we recommend you to install our application to view and edit contacts.

Thanks
